pullRequest.title: Im 20201005 loincpartlink fix
pullRequest.bodyText: Enabled support for loading either from a single LoincPartLink.csv (required for LOINC versions prior to 2.68) or from a combination of LoincPartLink_Primary.csv and LoincPartLink_Supplementary.csv (required for LOINC versions 2.68 and newer).

commit.message: Restore ability to load LOINC PartLink data from a single file for pre-2.68 versions.
Fixed tests to accommodate suggested changes from code review.
